LET'S LEARN HEBREW | (<http://www.j-archive.com/media/2007-12-14_DJ_11.
jpg> Jon of the Clue Crew shows a Hebrew word on a monitor.) Hebrew is based 
on 3-letter roots. The equivalent of "S", "D", "R" gives us "Sidrah", a Torah reading
, "Siddur", a prayer book, and this word for a special meal | seder. right: Max.

question: (Jon of the Clue Crew shows a Hebrew word on a monitor.) Hebrew is based on 3-letter roots.  The equivalent of "S", "D", "R" gives us "Sidrah", a Torah reading, "Siddur", a prayer book, and this word for a special meal
